```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)

# function to calculate expected draft position
draft_pick_sim <- function(n_groups = 2, n_teams = 30, n_sims = 100){
  old <- 1:n_teams
  n_groups <- n_groups - 1
  
  sims <- replicate(n_sims, rbinom(length(old), size = n_groups, prob = .5)) %>%
    tbl_df %>%
    bind_cols(data_frame(old)) %>%
    gather(sim, outcome, -old) %>%
    group_by(sim) %>%
    arrange(sim, outcome, old) %>%
    mutate(new = row_number())
  
  return(sims)
}
```

```{r}
numericInput("n_teams",
                    "Number of teams:",
                    min = 1,
                    max = 99,
                    value = 30)

numericInput("n_groups",

                    min = 2,
                    max = 30,
                    value = 2)
```

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Expected Draft Pick

```{r}
tn <- reactive(draft_pick_sim(n_groups = input$n_groups,
                     n_teams = input$n_teams,
                     n_sims = 10000))

renderPlot({
ggplot(tn(), aes(old, new)) +
    geom_point(data = tn() %>%
                 ungroup %>%
                 sample_n(1000),
               alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth() +
    labs(x = "Original Draft Position",
         y = "Expected Draft Position") +
    theme_bw(base_size = 18)
})
```
